APA-formatted correlation table

apa_cor.Rd

APA-formatted correlation table

Usage

apa_cor(
  data,
  p_value = 0.05,
  bold_significant = TRUE,
  output = c("flextable", "gt", "tibble"),
  family = "Times New Roman",
  font_size = 12,
  border_color = "black",
  border_width = 0.5,
  line_spacing = 2,
  ...
)

Arguments

data

data.frame or tibble with variables to be

p_value

p-value needed to be flagged as significant

bold_significant

bold significant correlations

output

output type. Can be "flextable" "gt" or "tibble"

family

font family

font_size

font size

border_color

border color

border_width

border width in pixels

line_spacing

spacing between lines

...

<data-masking> parameters passed to psych::corTest

Value

flextable, gt, or tibble

Examples

apa_cor(mtcars[, c("mpg", "am", "gear", "carb")], output = "flextable")
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'ftExtra':
#>   method                  from     
#>   as_flextable.data.frame flextable
